description: [MoustachedBouncer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1019) has injected content into DNS, HTTP, and SMB replies to redirect specifically-targeted victims to a fake Windows Update page to download malware.(Citation: MoustachedBouncer ESET August 2023)

external_references.description: Faou, M. (2023, August 10). MoustachedBouncer: Espionage against foreign diplomats in Belarus. Retrieved September 25, 2023.
